nodes.excerpt: Brainiac is a database of 150 cognitive biases, principles & models that influence customer's decision, let you create better products and help you increase your sales. Every single bias includes a sketch, description, possible applications and more
nodes.title: Brainiac - Database of 150 cognitive biases that control our decisions
nodes.author: Mike

localize.description: Brainiac是一个包含150个影响客户决策的认知偏差、原理和模型的数据库，让你创造更好的产品，帮助你提高销售额。每一个偏向都包括一个草图、描述、可能的应用等。
localize.tagline: 控制我们决策的150种认知偏差的数据库。

localize.description: Brainiac是一個包含150個影響客戶決策的認知偏差、原理和模型的數據庫，讓你創造更好的產品，幫助你提高銷售額。每一個偏向都包括一個草圖、描述、可能的應用等。
localize.tagline: 控制我們決策的150種認知偏差的數據庫。

nodes.excerpt: Static pages are so last year!💥 Drive user engagement, improve their experience and navigation by 21%, and increase your conversion rate with vector animation of empty states and UI icons. Get our free animations and customize them to your app design 🌈

localize.tagline: 用于网页和移动应用设计的动画图形和图标。

localize.tagline: 用於網頁和移動應用設計的動畫圖形和圖標。

nodes.excerpt: Figma Comments allows you to view and add new comments right from your phone. All you have to do is connect your Figma account and select the files you need. And as your teammates reply, you will see the new comments on the app, in real-time!

localize.description: Figma Comments允许你在手机上直接查看和添加新的评论。您所要做的就是连接您的 Figma 帐户并选择您需要的文件。当你的队友回复时，你将会在应用程序上看到新的评论，而且是实时的。

nodes.excerpt: Sizey is a MacOS app that helps you calculate aspect ratios! ⠀ — ⠀ ⚡️ Add Custom Aspect Ratios ⠀ 💥 Round to the nearest whole # ⠀ ➡️ Keyboard Shortcuts ⠀ 📐 Scale & Densities (@1x, @2x, @3x) ⠀ 🙌 Landscape & Portrait modes — ⠀ You design. We’ll math. ❤️📐
nodes.title: Sizey: Aspect Ratio Calculator - Instantly calculate any aspect ratio.
nodes.author: Meritt Thomas

localize.description: Sizey是一款MacOS应用程序，可以帮助您计算纵横比！⠀-⠀⚡️添加自定义纵横比⠀💥舍入到最接近的整数#⠀➡️键盘快捷键⠀📐比例和密度(@1x，@2x，@3x)⠀🙌横向和纵向模式-您设计的⠀。我们要学数学。❤️📐
localize.tagline: 即时计算任何纵横比。

localize.description: Sizey是一款MacOS應用程序，可以幫助您計算縱橫比！⠀-⠀⚡️添加自定義縱橫比⠀💥舍入到最接近的整數#⠀➡️鍵盤快捷鍵⠀📐比例和密度(@1x，@2x，@3x)⠀🙌橫向和縱向模式-您設計的⠀。我們要學數學。❤️📐
localize.tagline: 即時計算任何縱橫比。
